languages.text: "Ну, значит, как лгунья я тоже оказалась полным говном. Ничего, следующая жизнь, которую я себе придумаю, будет лучше и убедительнее".
"So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."
languages.original_text: "Ну, значит, как лгунья я тоже оказалась полным говном. Ничего, следующая жизнь, которую я себе придумаю, будет лучше и убедительнее".

traits.locale_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."
"So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."
"So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."
"So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

languages.text: “你是想告诉我，我撒的谎也烂得像屎一样吗？好吧，我下次会编个更好的故事，更有说服力的故事。”
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: “你是想告诉我，我撒的谎也烂得像屎一样吗？好吧，我下次会编个更好的故事，更有说服力的故事。”

languages.text: 「じゃあ、アタシもウソつきってこと？わかったよ。次は、もっとマシな、説得力のある話を考えるよ」
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: 「じゃあ、アタシもウソつきってこと？わかったよ。次は、もっとマシな、説得力のある話を考えるよ」

languages.text: «¿Me está diciendo que yo tampoco sé mentir? De acuerdo, la próxima vez procuraré inventarme una historia más convincente».
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me está diciendo que yo tampoco sé mentir? De acuerdo, la próxima vez procuraré inventarme una historia más convincente».

languages.text: « Alors pour couronner le tout, vous me dites que je ne sais pas mentir ? D'accord, j'inventerai une meilleure histoire la prochaine fois ; une histoire plus convaincante. »
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: « Alors pour couronner le tout, vous me dites que je ne sais pas mentir ? D'accord, j'inventerai une meilleure histoire la prochaine fois ; une histoire plus convaincante. »

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mir also auch sagen, dass ich auch eine beschissene Lügnerin bin? Gut – beim nächsten Mal werde ich mir einfach eine bessere Geschichte ausdenken, eine überzeugendere."
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mir also auch sagen, dass ich auch eine beschissene Lügnerin bin? Gut – beim nächsten Mal werde ich mir einfach eine bessere Geschichte ausdenken, eine überzeugendere."

languages.text: "Yani bana yalan söylemek konusunda da mı boktan olduğumu söylüyorsun? Peki, bir dahaki sefere daha iyi, daha ikna edici bir hikâye uydururum."
languages.original_text: "So you're telling me that I'm a shit liar as well? Fine — I'll just think of a better story next time, a more convincing one."

traits.locale_text: "Yani bana yalan söylemek konusunda da mı boktan olduğumu söylüyorsun? Peki, bir dahaki sefere daha iyi, daha ikna edici bir hikâye uydururum."
